Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
22.01.2012 SH SCR17880 Step3/5 Fixed error SQL0338 “JOIN predicate not valid”
20.09.2011 SH SCR16727 Step5 Added calc of V.GUARANTEESH
09.05.2011 GB SCR16396 Replaced GNRL_CODE by CLNT203_OFFICE and
removed Perform this step only if GNRL_CODE <> NL for Step 5
23.03.2011 GB SCR16256 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
13.03.2009 SH SCR14486 Step3 Fixed bug calc V.PENDINGBOOKINGSSETTLEMENTH
... values from individual client (vi.xxx)
-- Reset output parameters
Step 1: Select Clients to handle
...prepare client selection for DSQL use
-- Step 2: Margin = external balance settlement account
-- Step 3: Margin = internal balance settlement account
-- Step 4: Calculate "suspended" amount for Upfront clients
-- Step 5: Calculated margin should not cause that max finance is exceeded
-- Step 6: Calculated pending advances (not booked yet)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON, :1/CLNT where CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':4' and :5 for fetch only

select ACCT_CURRENCY, cast(sum(ACCC_MUTASETTLEMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC cross join :1/CLNT join :1/ACCT on ACCT_ADMNO = ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO and ACCT_CLNTNO = ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO and ACCT_DATE = ACCC_ACCT_DATE where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':2' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 and :3 group by ACCT_CURRENCY for fetch only

select cast(sum(INVA_ACTASPECIAL + (INVA_ACTAFACTORING * CLNT402_DEDUCTION / 100)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO, :1/INVA, :1/CLNT where INVO_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and INVO_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and INVO_AACTUALI < 0 and INVO_PAYMENTCODE <> 0 and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVA_CURRENCY = ':2' and CLNT614_INTERESTUPFRONT = 'Y' and :3 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Does not use DSQL because of currency recalculations and of limited number
of CONC rows (max one row per client)
... set to 0 (special for GNRL_CODE = RO)
-- If V.MAXFINANCEH = 0 then end this step

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP join :1/CLNT on :2 where CDEP_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDEP_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CDEP_TYPE in (1,6,7) for fetch only
select CLNT109_ATT_CURR, cast(sum(CLNT403_MAXFINANCETOTAL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNT where :2 group by CLNT109_ATT_CURR for fetch only

select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON, :1/CLNT where CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':4' and :5 for fetch only

select ACCT_CURRENCY, cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC cross join :1/CLNT join :1/ACCT on ACCT_ADMNO = ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO and ACCT_CLNTNO = ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO and ACCT_DATE = ACCC_ACCT_DATE where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':2' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 and :3 group by ACCT_CURRENCY for fetch only
select cast(sum(CLNA_AADVANCEH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNA, :1/CLNT where CLNA_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CLNA_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'N' and :2 for fetch only
